column4: How do I change settings like the gamma on Ubuntu so that way they match Mac's? I have Mac OS X on here and I like the colours it uses.
Try to install GNOME3 - it has more features on colours...
I'm actually still on GNOME 2 (Natty here). I didn't like Unity or GNOME 3, but what options have I on GNOME 2?
Haven't there options when clicking right mouse button on Desktop...?
